item.description:
From boardgamegeek.com:

Outburst is a game of lists. Two teams take turns trying to guess as many of the 10 answers to a topic on the cards. Bonus points can be earned by guessing a Target Answer determined by a die roll. The first team to 60 points wins! The game mechanism is very similar to the long time TV game show Family Feud. An example would be a Topic Card of "10 Cars Rich People Drive." The team whose turn it was, would have to name the 10 cars on the Topic Card by the time the minute sand timer runs out.
item.how_to_find_us: I will send out my house number the day before the event to those who have RSVPed 'Yes'.
item.name: Game Night: Outburst
